Name: 0_operators_ml_software_sets
Representative_Docs: ['in an ml system ml operators are defined by ai computing devices and implemented by the associated enabling software libraries', 'ml software toolkits vendors also implement their own extensions on ml operators which are the sets of functions executable by specific toolkit using the operators supported by the underlying hardware', 'the following difficulties exist in establishing unified and public set of ml operators for all kinds of ai computing devices and software the soundness of the operator set is hard to guarantee if these operators come out of merge of those existing operator sets']

Name: 1_modified_entry_values_references
Representative_Docs: ['iso and iec maintain terminology databases for use in standardization at the following addresses iso online browsing platform available at iec electropedia available at 3.1 artificial intelligence computing ai computing processing that leverages infrastructures to enable the set of methods or automated entities that together build optimize and apply an ai model 3.2 machine learning computing ml computing processing that leverages infrastructures to train and execute ml models 3.3 infrastructure hardware and software environment to support computer system and software design development and modification note to entry network facilities can be also infrastructure working with hardware and software', 'source iso/iec 2382:2015 modified removed note to entry and 3.6 functional unit entity of hardware or software or both capable of accomplishing specified purpose note to entry in iec the more general term item is used in place of functional unit', 'source iso/iec 27000:2018 3.52 3.12 effectiveness extent to which planned activities are realized and planned results are achieved source iso/iec 33001:2015 3.1.3 3.13 efficiency resources expended in relation to the accuracy and completeness with which users achieve goals source iso/iec 25063:2014 3.4 3.14 datatype set of distinct values characterized by properties of those values and by operations on those values source iso/iec 11404:2007 3.12 3.15 operator mathematical or logical symbol that represents an action to be performed in an operation or symbol representing the name of function source iso/iec/ieee 24765:2017 3.2716 modified 3.2716.3 and 3.2716.4 are combined']

Name: 2_computing_machine_learning_ml

Name: 10_scheduling_jobs_centres_collaboration
Representative_Docs: ['it can re-use and unite relatively old computing centres by scheduling proper jobs and creating collaboration as stronger computing centre', '3.16 schedule methods for controlling the timing of the execution of an activity within or represented by managed object source iso/iec 10164-15:2002 3.1.27 3.17 topology structure of the communication paths between the medium attachment points source iso/iec 14543-2-1:2006 3.2.30 3.18 stream sequence of representations of jobs or parts of jobs to be performed as submitted to an operating system source iso/iec 2382:2015 3.19 computing actions performed or approaches implemented by system aiming at processing specific kinds of data or providing solutions to certain tasks note to entry computing can also be system providing functionalities or characteristics', 'ml computing device-related job scheduling also includes ml job distribution and collaboration between computing centres']

Name: 11_sparsification_weights_graphs_structured
Representative_Docs: ['complementary sparsification makes the parts of computational graph to be complementary between zero and non-zero weights such that parts can be combined and computed with less operations', 'taking computational graph serving computer vision domain as an instance with structured sparsification the approach is to set the weights of convolution channel column of fully connected layer or more parts to zero', 'sparsification sparsification is used to set certain weights in less important parts in computational graph to zero for the purpose of saving the amount of computation spent on those parts']

Name: 12_parallelism_trained_dataset_pipeline
Representative_Docs: ['mixed parallelism mixed parallelism combines the principles of model parallelism and data parallelism', 'data parallelism data parallelism allows for splitting dataset into parts and distributing each part on to device where an entire model is trained based on the local piece of dataset', 'the following representative parallelism mechanisms for training can be applied model parallelism model parallelism allows for splitting model into parts and distributing them onto different ml computing devices such that different parts of model can be trained in parallel']

Name: 13_cache_data_coherence_writes
Representative_Docs: ['6.8.2 effectiveness and efficiency cache effectiveness describes to what extent cache mechanism selects the right data to store and decides reasonable length of duration to keep it such that the data can be found in the cache rather than being retrieved from the data source', 'cache mechanisms include but are not limited to the following cache-aside an application first looks into cache for desired data before requesting from data source access of which can be slower', 'the cache provider establishes view of the data in the cache used by the application and synchronizes the data to the data source']
